dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder in my domain! You dare disturb Thrum in his pulsating sanctum?!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Only here to collect what is mine. Stand down.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum does not fear you! You think yourself greater?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fear is irrelevant. Only power matters.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your power means nothing to Thrum.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, prepare to be annihilated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum shall crush you, little worm!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: See reason, Thrum. Together, we can wreak havoc.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum collaborates with no one! Leave or face wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stand in my way and be destroyed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum stands firm! Face me, if you dare!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Foolish. Your end is here.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum fears no end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No matter, I shall find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run away, coward. Thrum cares not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm not here to fight, but I will if I must.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A weakling's words! Thrum demands conflict.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I tire of this. Prepare to be obliterated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum welcomes destruction!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I will leave you for now. This isn't over.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, insignificant being. Thrum will remember.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the dark artifacts. You will step aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum guards darkness. You seek death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If death comes, it will be yours.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You threaten Thrum?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Yes, prepare to die.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum shall feast on your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your choice. Leave or perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum chooses battle. Perish yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, and you may live.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum needs not your mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then die.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Final words. Thrum shall not fall!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Pathetic lump, you aren't worth my time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flee, then. You are nothing to Thrum.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and you will find greater purpose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum needs no purpose beyond destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your choice. Meet your end.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum welcomes the challenge!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Pity, you would have been useful.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mock Thrum? Flee before I strike!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Who dares to challenge Zarathos, the Shadow Conqueror?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum dares! Pulsate in fear, conqueror.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then feel the wrath of Zarathos!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum will crush your arrogance, Zarathos!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare for your end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum welcomes annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are a fool to challenge me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will learn fear, conqueror.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Interesting. Perhaps we can make a deal.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum makes deals with no one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A pity. Then perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum shall devour you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. I will find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run, and stay gone. Thrum cares not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you not feel the power I wield?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum senses only weakness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you are blind. Feel my fury!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrum shall tear you apart!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your ignorance will be your demise.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Begone, pest. Thrum tires of you.
